description: Detects command line parameters used by Rubeus hack tool Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Rubeus Hack Tool
query: process.command_line:(*\ asreproast\ * OR *\ dump\ \/service\:krbtgt\ * OR *\ kerberoast\ * OR *\ createnetonly\ \/program\:* OR *\ ptt\ \/ticket\:* OR *\ \/impersonateuser\:* OR *\ renew\ \/ticket\:* OR *\ asktgt\ \/user\:* OR *\ harvest\ \/interval\:* OR *\ s4u\ \/user\:* OR *\ s4u\ \/ticket\:* OR *\ hash\ \/password\:*)
